sentences.sentence: The Basketball Hall of Fame gave Wilt an aptly-named "Stilt".
sentences.translation: 篮球名人堂给了威尔特一个恰如其人的绰号是“高跷”。

sentences.sentence: When holidays came, there were Yangko and stilt shows with people eager to participate.
sentences.translation: 过节时会有扭秧歌、踩高跷表演，人们都乐意参加。

sentences.sentence: Stilt 100 Gold Trophy Score 100 points in a single solo game with a single player.
sentences.translation: 高跷100黄金奖杯分数100分在一个单独的游戏与一名球员。
